item.title: [525]Inventory Interface Packet ID
item.dc:creator: @asshole_rule asshole_rule
item.description:
@asshole_rule wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:522696”][quote author=asshole_rule link=topic=641192.msg4319904#msg4319904 date=1372095590]

Does anyone happen to know the inventory interface’s packet ID in 525?

It is packet 248 in 317.

How about you look in the client? It’ll be in there, if its a packet.
[/quote]
Where would I look. I am pretty sure its client.java. But in 5252 its a bit different where I they are in client.java.[/quote]

Never looked at a 525 client.

Read full topic

item.title: [525]Inventory Interface Packet ID
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

Does anyone happen to know the inventory interface’s packet ID in 525?

It is packet 248 in 317.

Ex of how it looks in 317:

	/**
	 * Sends an inventory interface.
	 * 
	 * @param interfaceId
	 *            The interface id.
	 * @param inventoryInterfaceId
	 *            The inventory interface id.
	 * @return The action sender instance, for chaining.
	 */
	public ActionSender sendInterfaceInventory(int interfaceId,
			int inventoryInterfaceId) {
		player.getInterfaceState().interfaceOpened(interfaceId);
		player.write(new PacketBuilder(248).putShortA(interfaceId).putShort(
				inventoryInterfaceId).toPacket());
		return this;
	}

Read full topic
